website_summaries.verdict: A great set if you're looking for an inexpensive introduction to essential oils.
pros: Features eight different 10 milliliter bottles, including popular oils like lavender, peppermint, and orange
High-quality, strong scents at a decent price
Comes with a booklet full of basic blend ideas
cons: Some reports of problems with the oils spilling during shipping

customer_reviews.title: and loved that there is a book that comes with it ...
customer_reviews.text: New to essential oils, but scents were strong, packaged well, and loved that there is a book that comes with it that gives you some basic blend and uses. I received them today and have already used the sweet orange, lavender, tea tree, and lemongrass.
customer_reviews.author: Raechel T.

customer_reviews.title: Oils To You
customer_reviews.text: This is the first oil product I have ever purchased. This product had great reviews and that was the main reason for my original purchase. That being said I cannot give you an objective review based against other products BUT I am very happy with my purchase and will be purchasing more of the ArtNatural products in the future. The product smells great and works very well in my diffuser. I
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: I got this to go along with the humidifier i purchased for my mother n law fot mothers day. The packaging is really great and secure and it comes in a variety of aroma oils all in one package. They all smell magnificent. A really great buy indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter pack. The fragrance is not overpowering with a few drops and lasts. I didn't realize how much our sense of smell can affect our moods until using these oils. I sleep better with the lavander and the citrus puts me in an energetic mood. The price is great and you get a variety of scents. The tops go on securely so I can use some and then put them back in the box with no leaking. The lavender is very relaxing. I love how the box tells you what each oil does. I highly recommend these oils. If I could give 10 stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: Sav

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fragrances!.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sampling! Works very well with my diffuser. From this sampling I can determine my future fragrance choices; I have also experimented with blending certain fragrances together, etc. This is a great sampling for learning about the different fragrances and deciding which ones you want to buy in a larger size next time.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: They do not smell like anything naturals
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what I did wrong to deserve these oils. They do not smell like anything naturals. Two of them smell of rotten bananas. All the others smell like the cheap dollar store version of a knock off candy brand. Not only that but they are not even potent. You can add 10 drops and it will last 5 minutes in a diffuser. I regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jben

customer_reviews.title: Im not sure exactly what Essential Oils but...
customer_reviews.text: OK so my wife has a ton of the hot way type air fresheners around the house but we have a pet pig and he seems to think they are some type of food so I decided to get these oils and a defuser. My wife said its not what a defuser and oils are for but guess what?????? THey smell good so we are using them now haha The good,: 1. it only takes a few drops (i thought it took a bottle at a time) 2. they are not as expensive as I thought 3. They smell good (most of them) 4. We got a cool color changing defuser 5. Our pig hasnt decided to eat them yet
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Check for leaking bottles
customer_reviews.text: I received the package of 2 boxes of ArtNaturals Aromatherapy essential oils on time. I have purchased these in the past with no problem. Loved them! This time when I opened the first box I could smell the oils - not good. I opened the box and found more than 1 bottle was leaking. The seal seemed to be opened slightly, but not broken completely. I went to check the 2nd box and surprised that it also had many bottles leaking the same way as well. I'm not sure why, but hope I can return these and receive a set of new (UNOPENED) essential oils.
customer_reviews.author: Milette Moscoso

customer_reviews.title: Nice oils. I like the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice oils. I like the price. But you can definitely tell the difference between these oils and Young Living oils. These say they are 100% pure, but they don't have the same pure, strong aroma as the Young Living oils. That being said these are also a fraction of the price of Young Living oils too. I would recommend buying these oils if your intention is to dilute them in a defuser. I would stick with Young Living oils for topical use though.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Already opened
customer_reviews.text: All but 3 were busted open and didn’t have the lock on them meaning someone already opened this package and maybe returned it I had to chuck it because it was so strong and overwhelming that everything it touched smelled
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Package came saturated in oil...
customer_reviews.text: Package came saturated in oil. Nothing was broken inside the box, but the foam inside and the cardboard and booklet are completely soaked through like a bottle was poured inside and then closed for shipping. Also these do not smell "pure". I have had multiple people smell them (Some familiar with essential oils and others not) and everyone says they do not smell right at all. Almost like they are cut with something. I even showed these to my friends wife (who sells doTerra) and she said "you get what you pay for" and agreed they did not smell "100% pure" almost chemical like. Bottom line: These will not be purchased again.
customer_reviews.author: PNW '64 Impala

customer_reviews.title: Great Oils
customer_reviews.text: I am not an expert on oils as this is my first set. But I have to say I think they are wonderful. My daughter came home sick with a cold/allergies so we used the peppermint and eucalyptus in the diffuser. We suffer from allergies here in Texas quite a bit so this is great. My whole family loves these oils I will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Diluted with additive. Not 100% pure.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed in this brand of EOs. It states that it is 100% pure and unadulterated. However, I can clearly see that they added a carrier oil to the essential oils therefore rendering it unpure and their description is incorrect. Plus, the scent is offensive and obviously not the true scent of the essential oils.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Jen

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, not lasting
customer_reviews.text: Received these and i could smell them a mile away, something leaked in the box. The little book that comes with it is nice to have, informative. The oils themselves are not that good honestly, Had to put 9 drops in the diffuser so i can smell anything! And the scent goes away after 30 minutes, diffuser ends up just running on water. Tried other brands, 3 drops is more than enough and the scent lasts until the diffuser runs out of water.. something is off with these "oils"
customer_reviews.author: NELWERR

customer_reviews.title: Rancid oils
customer_reviews.text: The oils I got smelled rancid. Absolutely horrible. The sweet orange smelled fine, but the rest were terrible. I'm so sad! I was excited to use in my diffuser, but I'll have to find oils another way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Art Naturals awful customer service - stay away.
customer_reviews.text: These oils are terrible. Poorest quality. The diffuser that AN sells is also terrible. Last diffuser lasted 8 months. Company will stand not behind warranty 5 minutes beyond the 6 month "warranty". Dealing direct with AN customer service is a joke. Endless email chains back and forth to take care of issues. *Buyer Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Tom in Boston MA

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set specifically for the lavendar. My daughter has night terrors and aromatherapy was our last hope. Totally helps. Out favorite thing to do is combine lavendar, peppermint and a bit of eucalyptus. We're all sleeping wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: J. Quick

customer_reviews.title: Hit or miss
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing this set and this batch was no where near the smells of the first batch. Something smelled off in almost all the oils except the Orange smelled great. I had the older set to compare and even my husband said they smelled very different. Not sure why? i would try again but don't think it's worth the hassle of returning. I was very pleased with the first set but not this batch. Although packaging was much better and the oils had not leaked.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Ashbrook

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried to order these because I saw the shipping wasn't great. As in, the oils were leaking out of the bottles. I was pleased to see that when I received mine, they were in perfect condition. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: shelby

customer_reviews.title: save your money
customer_reviews.text: when I received these two of them had spilled in the box and made the whole thing greasy. They smell really strongly which is good but they all smell the same for the most part to me. They all had sort of a citrus scent and I don't know why. They are also hard to control because the bottles are glass and sometimes it comes out fast therefore you cannot control the number of "drops" that you need. I definitely think there are better options out there.
customer_reviews.author: rockandroll

customer_reviews.title: Good variety if you know what you’re getting.
customer_reviews.text: Likes 4 out of the 8 oils. Just wish that the company would let you pick which oils you want instead of just giving you a variety pack. I’ve tried using the tea tree oil, orange oil, and the frankincense, but they are overpowering. Even one drop is too much in my opinion. If you are a beginner like me, and you just use them to diffuse- I recommend buying singles that way you don’t waste your money on an oil that you will never use.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly

customer_reviews.title: GET YOUR SELF A BOX OF THESE...
customer_reviews.text: Just got these in. Great product made me purchase two more orders of this without fully utilizing any just based on one bottle slightly leaked and the scent is decent so I'm not triping. I hope my next orders arrive sealed tight please. The price is second to none with Prime! Comes with mini book with all sorts of info on how to use these oils. Plus all oils are like in a styrofoam case to keep them in order for easy access or handling, storage, etc...if you're looking to purchase any oils- these are it!!!! Good oils are hard to find at these prices even regular price is a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Lui

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for a starter set!
customer_reviews.text: The 8 oils arrived in a sturdy, well cushioned box that was very attractive in its own right. Also included was a really helpful brochure containing descriptions and ‘recipes’ for using the oils for so many things I hadn’t even considered! I bought them mainly to use in a diffuser as most of my favorite scents were in this group. I’ve only made one diffuser mix so far, but I’m loving it. I think I’ll be ordering another diffuser soon and try some of the blends offered on ArtNaturals website. Another big plus is the design of the individual bottles which allows for easy counting of drops. I’m very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Atkins

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT COMPMANY WITH A GREAT PRODUCTS
customer_reviews.text: Although these oils dont seem to be as "Pure" as my Doterra Oils They seem to work just fine for our purposes of making lotions,salves & other DIY stuff. I have purchased Art Naturals Products for awhile now because they have good products, great customer service & a decent price. Thats a big part of why I bought this oil set. i will be ordering it again. when purchasing items for my family I too rely heavily on the reviews to make a decision on my purchases.If I decide to write a review its because I have a strong opinion on the product one way or another & wish to share that. I do hope you find my review helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy H

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: When I received the product, I could smell the oils before I even opened the envelope. It was disappointing to open the box and find that the contents had spilled all over the box. I don't know if I received a bad batch, or if the packaging needs to be improved. I bought this mainly to use with my dryer balls when drying laundry. It did not leave any scent on the laundry, which left me even more disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.text: One bottle came leaking and still continues to leak, so we have to store it upright and not in the box with the rest. Other than that they're good in the diffuser we got. I don't have a lot of experience with oils, but it does seem like we have to use a lot more than the recommended amounts when we do use them. Next time we'll be trying out a different brand. This may just be a case of you-get- what- you-pay-for, but they smell decent and were cheap so it's hard to complain too much.
customer_reviews.author: Soren Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Comes with a brochure that explains the oils and what scents are used for what purposes.
customer_reviews.text: This product was a gift so I haven’t smelled all the scents myself but I did smell the lemongrass and started up the oil diffuser with that scent to show my friend how to use it. It scented the whole room very quickly and was very nice. I think the oils are quite strong because I used more than needed 😊. Since then she has told me she has used the sweet orange and likes that as well. I don’t know about the other scents but they are all labeled so you should know ahead of time if those are scents you like. The bottles are very attractive and come in a nice box.
customer_reviews.author: MeerKat

customer_reviews.title: disgusting
customer_reviews.text: Half of these smell practically the same, and they all smell slightly rancid. Absolutely disgusting. I don't know if I got a bad batch, but I will never be buying this brand again. I suspect they are either artificial (not 100%) or just poorly made. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These have a great scent and seem to be super high quality. I use them in my car essential oil air freshener, my essential oil diffuser, and in a candle warmer. They work best in the essential oil diffuser. In the car, the scent is pretty faint. In my candle warmer, the scent is strong but then it dissipates quickly. In the diffuser, the scent is perfect and lasts for hours! They did come a little spilled when I ordered them but the bottles didn't look opened or broken, so I didn't bother returning them since I don't care about the packaging that got destroyed. If this review was helpful, please click the helpful button. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel J

customer_reviews.title: so far so good! They are very potent
customer_reviews.text: so far so good! They are very potent. I just received last night. I smelled them through the packaging. I think one has a broken seal and spilled. I touched every single one to determine the culprit of the high powered scent and found the eucalyptus oil is a 1/3 empty, confirming the fact that something spilled. Can I get a replacement for that one? I hope so. Other than that, I put a couple of drops of lavender in the diffuser and slept peacefully!
customer_reviews.author: anewmeNOW

customer_reviews.title: A leaking mess, waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: I should have taken other reviews more seriously, the item continues to ship without seals on the bottles and, in my case, loose caps. After spending considerable time trying to clean up the leaky mess and save what was left in the bottles, I just threw everything out so I could air-out my house. For anyone electing to take a chance, I suggest opening the box outside first as the smell and seepage of these condensed products can be sickening and hard to get rid of.
customer_reviews.author: Temken

customer_reviews.title: Bottles leaked...
customer_reviews.text: Phew, two bottles leaked and then only two others we were actually able to open. No matter what we di, push and turn, pull and turn, nothing worked; the caps just kept going around and around, quite frustrating. The two that we managed to open, the orange and the lemon, were great, but the others are useless. Plus even though they came in a very nice box for future storing, the leaked bottles were too much, literally. I'd also suggest shoppers to buy what you like because based on the ones that leaked, I would never want them anyway, way too strong and irritating.
customer_reviews.author: Mosquito

customer_reviews.title: Great variety, size and price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set because with nearly 4,000 reviews, I figured I couldn't go wrong. I just purchased a couple diffusers for my home and didn't know which essential oil would smell the best. I've never even heard of a few of them, like the lemongrass and the frankincense. This set is perfect for sampling the scents before buying a big bottle of them, and the price is just right. And you only need a few drops for the diffuser, which means this set is going to last me as really long time. So far, my favorite scent is the sweet orange. It literally smells like orange peels but is so subtle.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Love the oils but was bummed that the set of ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the oils but was bummed that the set of 8 had duplicate ones and missing others. No tea tree in my set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with these oils
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with these oils. The box it comes in is very sturdy and the bottles are protected by foam. The oils smell very nice. I did not experience any leaking from any bottles. The information that comes with the oils even includes 'recipes' for combining oils. You'll be happy if you buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: SmartOne

customer_reviews.title: Not bad as a starter set, but the quality is low
customer_reviews.text: Hey, you get what you pay for, and these cost a fraction of what essential oils usually do. So not surprisingly, these are low quality scented oils. You will need to use much more than the recommended amount, and some of them have very little scent at all. A couple are pretty good, like the orange and peppermint. The product is nicely packaged and presented. This was the first box of aroma oils I ever purchased, and it was not bad as an introduction to this kind of product, but I'm moving on to better stuff.
customer_reviews.author: T. Burrows

customer_reviews.title: Good oils for the price, if you get them
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased these essential oils twice before (one for myself and as a gift) and had no complaints. The oils smell great, they last a while. Good quality and nice packaging with suggestions on usage. However, I was not happy with my most recent order. Out of the 8 bottles, the lemongrass was not filled completely. The seal was intact so it must have been a manufacturing issue. I used the oil once (3-4 drops) and the bottle is completely empty. I have purchased other Art Natural products and like them overall but I was really unhappy to see that I paid for eight EOs and received seven.
customer_reviews.author: N Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Great value and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I never shopped around for essential oils until I had already ordered this product. I have been amazed at the prices I have seen. This box is such a great value! Great scent selection, suggested use booklet, and customer service. I had problems with bottles that had leaked in my first box and the customer service reached out to me to assure everything was okay and quickly handled the issue when I brought up the problems I had experienced
customer_reviews.author: starvingcollegestudent

customer_reviews.title: Just buy them!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous buying essential oils on amazon because just like everything there are good reviews and bad reviews but I am so glad I bought these! First of all the box comes with a little booklet that gives you like 20 different recipes that you could use these for such as cleaning purposes, beauty purposes etc. Next, they all smell great! I wanted to try out essential oils to help with my anxiety and so far the lavender and peppermint have helped! These are 100% worth it and I’m actually going to buy them for my mom for her birthday since I’ve had such a great experience with them.
customer_reviews.author: Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Hoped For - STINKS
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try this brand of essential oils but buyer beware. They stink! There is an underlying hew of whatever the oil is supposed to be, but the majority of the scent is some unknown, overpowering, chemical. Instant headache! I have used pure essential oils for sometime and this is definitely something I had never experienced before. Additionally, in trying to return I found it is a non-returnable item due to it being “flammable” per Amazon Customer Service. Although Amazon Customer Service was great in getting me a refund anyhow, this was by far not the product I had hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyne

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Not a fan of new packaging
customer_reviews.text: I bought this package 2 years ago and I loved the oils. I used them pretty regularly and they lasted me almost 2 years! I just purchased my second box and while I still love the oils I HATE the new packaging. They used to be packaged in a small box that kept each bottle upright. When my package arrived my lavender oil had leaked into the box because they were stored on its side in the box and the lid was not placed correctly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top essential oils
customer_reviews.text: Thank you. After a delay in delivering, I received your product twice. Thank you. I am in the process of trying your essential oils. I tried the Lavender and the Eucalyptus and each was very good. I am looking forward to try some of the other oils which I have never tried before. Your sample of small bottles is a very interesting way to try some of the oils that are not common. I certainly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: professor

customer_reviews.title: Best Essential oils I have found so far
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these oils to go with my diffuser I have in my living room. I love every scent and have learned how to do different combinations. These oils come with a pamphlet that gives you ideas on how to use them with diffusers, skin, and sprays. The main reason why I give these a 5 star rating is because of the strength of the scent. They fill my room completely and even spread throughout my downstairs. I will be ordering more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Diana P

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this
customer_reviews.text: First things first, I received the box with oil leaking all over the package. It leaked to the outside of the box and saturated the foam packaging inside. On opening it, I discovered that the ironic thing is, the bottle that leaked was one of the only ones that weren't faulty! Of the bottles in the kit, I'm only able to use about four. I cannot open two thirds of the bottles because of a faulty bottle top! The packaging and quality of this product is such that it shouldn't even be on Amazon. I was able to use the lemongrass, the tea tree, and the peppermint. The sweet orange leaked all over the package so thanks a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: The oils are potent & the recommended qualities are accurate
customer_reviews.text: The oils are potent & the recommended qualities are accurate. Scents are consistent with what you'd expect when used in a diffuser. Honestly seems like a great deal when compared to others in this price range, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: NAS

customer_reviews.title: Arrived opened/spilled
customer_reviews.text: Upon receiving these oils and opening the box I found multiple oils lids had come loose. Multiple oils spilled in the box. I'm not sure how this even happens considering they have the plastic seal around them that you "break open" the first time you use them. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Why are these so hard to open?/edited with honesty review
customer_reviews.text: So, I'll think about adding more stars if I can ever get all of the bottles open. I understand you don't want them to leak, but this is absurd. The tea tree smells strange, but the Eucalyptus, sweet orange and frankincense are nice. Edit: I got all of them open, except rosemary and lemon grass. These are horrible. They cannot be undiluted, because most of them have some weird rancid oil smell. And they smell the same. Kinda like wax. Peppermint is unrecognizable. I will be requesting a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Philly Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Smells great but bottles may not come sealed properly!
customer_reviews.text: Product smells great. I know this because it arrived damaged. Sweet Orange bottle was not sealed properly and leaked all over inside of box and other bottles plus description booklet inside. Other bottles were sealed correctly. So 1/8th of the present is ungiftable. Kind of disappointed as present was for someone who wanted the orange scent. Will have to live with it since product states it's unreturnable, but will cautiously consider another maker for next purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cinderella

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Value for the money is good on these.. but the lavender does NOT smell like lavender. They were also really hard to open initially... so much so that my frankincense got damaged.. now I need to use an eye-dropper to get it out. They also leak into the foam that holds them in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Not 100%
customer_reviews.text: Not 100% oils. I’ve started using a different brand in my diffuser and they are so much stronger. I can actually see the oils now when dropped into a little water.
customer_reviews.author: amazoncrazy

customer_reviews.title: Its a top 8 pack, some are great, some not so much.
customer_reviews.text: Some are great some are not. Orange, Lemon both have very strong scents, where as Lavender you can barely smell at all. A few of them do have a slight oily type smell and I do not enjoy them at all, like tea tree and eucalyptus. Not sure on the ones I do not like if its just preference or they actually smell like oil or just bad. No headaches like I read on a few negative reviews, and for the most part a great value sampler. Would but specific ones again but this full pack.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle J Sauerhoefer

customer_reviews.title: Some bottles not full
customer_reviews.text: Received exactly the oils that were listed. They came in a nice box lined in foam. The bottles are as described in terms size, but two of them were noticeably less full than the others. At least 1/4 of the product was missing from these two bottles. It was a Christmas gift, and it arrived on the 23rd, so I didn't have time to replace them. I had to gift them with apologies.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Barger-muncie

customer_reviews.title: Horrible packaging and seals that won’t open!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my mom because I had gotten me one and loved it! When the package was received one of the oils leaked all over the box! Two of the oils with the leak proof seal are damaged so they don’t open at all! I was really disappointed because I recommended them highly to everyone I’ve talked to but I will be calling them all and tell them not to order because the packaging is terrible!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Perez

customer_reviews.title: I love the nice refreshing smell
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful smell. Orange makes the room smell refreshing. Use it in the morning with my InnoGear Aromatherapy oil diffuser and they work very well together. You can also use it in a spray bottle when you wake up in the morning. Nice and fresh - no morning breath smell in the room and since its all natural don't have to worry about having toxins in your air. Its a great product. They also send you a nice little booklet that tells you some of the uses of the oils and explains each oil. Very Nice. Wonderful product. Love it. Really deserves more than 5 stars...
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Starter Pack!
customer_reviews.text: Fragrances are great! Not overpowering. The packaging is great also, so spills or anything! Only 4 stars because I was hoping for some sort of small instructions guide as an essential oils starter (for example, what is frankincense good for? How much lavender should I put in the bathtub? Can the rosemary be used for cooking as well?).
customer_reviews.author: emily White

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me
customer_reviews.text: I used these to make homemade candles as gifts and the results were pretty good! I used a whole bottle for a medium sized candle and it seemed to work out well. The scents right out of the bottle are strong and while I didn't use them in a conventional format (diffuser or any of the other methods the product recommends) I do think for the price you get a fair amount of product to use in a variety of formats. I really liked the sweet orange scent the most, but I am not personally into most essential oil scents. Either way, for the price point, these are worth a shot.
customer_reviews.author: MissBlinou

customer_reviews.title: Leaking oil all in the box.
customer_reviews.text: Update: turns out all but one was leaking. I had to retape the labels. I really hope they rethink their packaging system. They smell wonderful but my orange 🍊 one was leaking and made a mess of the box, the label was coming off, and a little less than half of the oil was gone from the bottle. It is way too much work to do the exchange for just one oil so I’m just dealing with the loss of oil and mess. Other than that, it seems like a good product. Wish they could just send me a new orange one though.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Nice set but oil dispenses too quickly
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice starter set of oils for diffusing. It has a good variety and they smell high-quality. I like mixing two oils together in my diffuser for aromatic cocktails. I knocked off a star only because the control drip dispenser top on many of the bottles does not work properly, allowing wayyy too much oil out at once. Just pay attention when dispensing and you should be fine. Overall, a nice little set.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Oils are first rate, caps are poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The oils are very good. The downside is the poor quality of the bottle caps. They have this little locking device that is supposed to mimic a tamper proof cap, but it’s such poor quality, that 3 of my bottles would not open. They just kept spinning and clicking but not loosen. I had to cut the caps off and “seal” them with toothpicks. I leave the other bottles caps very loose so that the locking mechanism does not re-engage. I would not buy these again because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny G. Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Fakes!
customer_reviews.text: These are not oils at all, they are scented water. I've been using oils for a while now and I know the difference.They evaporate very quickly which is not characteristic of oil. Im glad they were cheap, all 8 bottles cost the price of one bottle of real oil. Lavender and another bottle were leaking in the package as well. Some of the oils smell bad which is not therapeutic at all. I'm very disappointed but I blame myself, price too good means I should have known better.
customer_reviews.author: Bonny

customer_reviews.title: Open bottle - Very disappointed in the packaging.
customer_reviews.text: The oils themselves seem to be good. I have the peppermint and the eucalyptus in my diffuser right now, and the scent is pretty intense with just a few drops of each. However, the orange oil bottle was not closed correctly, and about half of the bottle was spilt in the box, giving the cardboard box as well as the instruction booklet a very nice and intense orange smell.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL VASE WITH AROMATHERAPY BEFEFITS
customer_reviews.text: I have had 4 other aroma therapy dispensers, and the thin wood covers eventually cracked. I hesitated to pay more for this glass vase type dispenser, but it is worth every penny. The colors are all beautiful, and when it's on the color-change mode, every color is just mesmerizing. Also, the collection of oils that I bought are excellent, long-lasting, and smell delightful. I highly recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Y

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, weak/artificial scents
customer_reviews.text: Most of the scents are not very strong. Lavender kind of just smells bad than actual lavender. These are not high quality oils (get what you pay for). I don’t recommend for use in a diffuser, pretty disappointing. The scents are weak/artificial compared to true oil scents.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica W.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time was packaged very nicely, product was as described & once I opened the product the oils were beautifully placed into a very secure box each were surrounded by cushion, the lids were all tightly secured on the bottles, and they came with a pamphlet explaining each oil and what they could be utilized for and had recipes of how you can utilize these oils for multiple uses in the home....for your health.... mood...clothing...Beauty...skincare & diffusers. Highly recommend, will order again
customer_reviews.author: Amber Dawn Decker

customer_reviews.title: at least one of the oils (lavender) wasnt full like the others and the box reeked and smell of ...
customer_reviews.text: this is a 5 star thing, really. but when i opened it, at least one of the oils (lavender) wasnt full like the others and the box reeked and smell of it. i had to wipe down every bottle dry of the oil. the box this came in wasn't sealed. i'm guessing someone decided to open the box, opened one of the bottles, noticed the seal proof that began to click, and put it back in the box without tightening it fully. i didnt want to go through the hassle of taking photos and what not. i'm trying to relax this year.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M. Cornejo

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set, great price, great scents
customer_reviews.text: Great starter set! And great price! All arrived nicely packaged, no spills, and shipping was timely. They all smell as expected, no disappointing surprises, and are filled to the top with dropper tips. My favorite part is the clever sayings in tiny letters on each bottle. You'll see if you buy them. :) I would definitely buy this brand again!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: These scents are fantastic in a small room diffuser and don't overpower the room.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these oils for use at home in a small room diffuser that uses water to disperse the oils. I think the scents are strong enough that I can use a little bit for subtle scents in the room without overpowering everything else. I've had other aromatherapy oils that were too strong no matter how little I used. I've only tried a few scents so far from the pack and love all of them so far. The packaging is REALLY nice. I've bookmarked this set so I can come back to it for gift giving in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Ellenich

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an essential oils connoisseur as I purchased this to compliment my oil diffusers that I purchased. I chose this particular type based on the high reviews and I am happy I purchased this set. I've only diffused the lavender and orange thus far and both are very nice smelling. The packaging was great as none of my bottles were broken. I more than likely reorder the same set when I run out. I liked the including booklet which discusses the different scents in depth that is a very nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality! Great price! Good packaging!
customer_reviews.text: Great little set for anyone. We have bought these twice now and they last awhile. You can’t beat what you get for the price. The scents are fairly strong but what your looking to get out of a decent product. My wife mixes them and loves her oils. We will continue to buy these because of price/quality! Also the packaging is nice and a good way to store them. Would make a great gift or for somebody first getting into e oils.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Zaffarano

customer_reviews.title: Poor product
customer_reviews.text: Need to use many many drops in a diffuser. Do not recommend. Much better products out there. Going to throw out because waste of time using.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! No regrets and living the scents.
customer_reviews.text: Read many reviews good and bad on so many oils including this one. No regrets at all on this 8 pack of oils. Packaged nicely in a nice storage case in foam, all sealed, full, and none leaking. I paid twice as much for a 6 count starter pack of only 5 ml bottles and the scents and strength of the art natural oils are so much better. Only having to use half the amount in my diffuser as I was the more expensive oils. These are a must and you will not be disappointed in your purchase. I will definitely be a returning customer.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Baaaaarrfffff
customer_reviews.text: I've had these concentrates for about 2 weeks now. Ive tried them all, using different quantities of each at each time, and I gotta tell ya, they are all disgusting. The smell makes me sick to my stomach. I wish I could remember the brand I used a couple years ago. These are awful
customer_reviews.author: am_vicious

customer_reviews.title: It was amazing experience. I guess i have to be honest ...
customer_reviews.text: It was our first time ordering from them. It was amazing experience. I guess i have to be honest that i never bought another essential oil from anywhere before it was my first time buying the set. It came in a nice box and also it had nice instruction to show us exactly what we have to do to blend the essential oils to certain smells. Maybe it is common for other essential oils cones in pack but it was sure nice to have the guide. Thank you for the nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Catfish88

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: These do not smell like what they are labeled as. Smells like the oil is rancid.
customer_reviews.author: Beth McGee

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I used the sweet orange mixed with vanilla to make creamsicle bath bombs for some gifts. They smell fantastic. The lemongrass is great to add to DIY cleaners. It will make your floors smell delicious. After a bad arthritis flare the other day, I added frankincense and eucalyptus to my cbd oil salve and it was very soothing. It seemed to enhance the effectiveness of it. I find the presentation of the packaging very charming and would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: MORE FOR LESS MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because the ones I normally buy were not in stock. I do not regret getting these. I had read some of the reviews that mentioned some of the bottles had opened in shipment, so I was concerned. I received the box and there was a strong peppermint smell. I kind of was expecting it, so I checked each of the bottles, however, none were opened and they were intact. It has 8 instead of 6 bottles, so i got 2 more oils that I normally get. They work fine and as well as my previous ones. I got more for less money. I think I will stay with this one. Thanks again.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisena96706

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 dogs, and sometimes you can clearly tell. Sprays just weren't cutting it, especially because they dont last. These essential oils are fantastic. My son and husband commented on them when they walked in and I had the defuser going with one of the oils in it. They don't comment on anything.
customer_reviews.author: Janet T

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Quality At A Great Price
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived on time in excellent condition wrapped it with care. This is my favorite essential oil! I think all of the oils smell lovely even the scents that I don't normally like. I've bought this set of oils three times for myself and six additional as gifts. I highly recommend this brand it's great quality at a little bit goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Angela B. Kimble

customer_reviews.title: This has been a great starter pack for me
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to essential oils. This has been a great starter pack for me. My only disappointment is the packaging. It doesn't come with a holder for the EO. They are separated in a foam piece, but there is no back on the foam. I guess a permanent holder would increase the overall price. The oils themselves have been great. Some of them work like a miracle. Pretty amazing. So great going natural.
customer_reviews.author: Kim McQuade

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These smell horrible and cheap. The only passable sent is the lavender
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Lemongrass leaked before opening.
customer_reviews.text: Scents smell fantastic and work well. Unfortunately, when we got the box the lemongrass had leaked everywhere. Before we even opened it. All of our mail smelled of lemon so I’m not able to sit it on its side which is frustrating but all of the others made it. Update: leaked lemongrass oil was set on my countertop and has now stained into my countertop, seeping through the seal. Wow. Please be careful!
customer_reviews.author: drdogmom

customer_reviews.title: Stay Away
customer_reviews.text: Received a USED product. Two of the bottles has broken seals on them and leaked all over.
customer_reviews.author: JohnVegas

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing
customer_reviews.text: I love the variety of scents offered. I keep a diffuser by my work computer and by my bed so it's nice to have options for different times of the day. There are some great ways to mix them to produce new, delicious smells, too. My personal favorites are the lavender and eucalyptus (on their own), but I also love mixing peppermint with teatree if I'm under the weather. Unfortunately these are very small capsules so I am now out of lavender and eucalyptus, but I'll just have to place a new order for those soon.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Keogh

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and smell GREAT
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome little samples of essential oils. They came in this cute little box with instructions on what to use them for and how to use them. It also came with a little booklet that tells you different mixtures to make in order to achieve different things. These are awesome, but I wish they were a little bigger. But they’re fantastic for the price and I would recommend them to anyone who is just starting out with a new diffuser or wants to learn more about the benefits of using essential oils!
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Kitto

customer_reviews.title: Two out of my 8 bottles were rendered useless. Especially for this price I expected better.
customer_reviews.text: So my box of essentially oils. One vile was completely empty. I noticed then that the lining of the box was a light yellow color. I am guessing it had not been closed properly and leaked out. I also have another bottle I have tried everything in my power to open and it refuses to budge. So two bottles completely useless. I expected A LOT better for the cost. Plus these bottles don't have the usual little droplet stopper so you can gentle shake out a small amount or larger amount, that is removable upon your choice. It's just an open bottle top that glugs out.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Walker

customer_reviews.title: 1 word. Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I paired it with a bamboo dispenser also amazing  I thought 20.00 was a bit high for the product at first, but now I see why. My only regret is I used too many drops - 6 - so my eyes are watering. That is my fault though. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: macker

customer_reviews.title: Don’t smell good
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these a year ago. I was new to EO. A few of them didn’t smell like I thought they should. Specifically lavender smelt off and I could not use it in a diffuser (smelt like chemicals). I’ve since bought other EOs and now know these were bad. Also tea free, eucalyptus, and peppermint all smelt nearly the same. :(
customer_reviews.author: Ayla

customer_reviews.title: These are great for their price!
customer_reviews.text: These were amazing for their price! The only reason I'm giving a four star review is because the scents weren't quite on point. The peppermint did not smell like pure peppermint it seemed as if it was dulled down or something? I can't really explain it except maybe I'm used to a certain brand and I bought these because of their online price. For their price I will definitely buy them again because they worked the same body-wise as most other brands it's just to take their scents were a little bit off.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Gannon

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Scents
customer_reviews.text: Great essential oils for aromatherapy! Smell beautiful and are not washed out. Be sure not to let them sit for too long, otherwise they'll dry out. But over all a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Xayne

customer_reviews.title: The Best Oils by FAR!
customer_reviews.text: I use essential oils daily for more natural well-being in my life and I have tried pretty much of all of the brands available. So much so, that I even signed up to sell DoTerra because it was a bit cheaper to buy that way. Needless to say, I decided to try ArtNaturals, after reading reviews, I fell in love with their 100% pure oils. I now own the following Peppermint, Tee Tree, Rosemary, Orange, Lemongrass, Lavender, Eucalyptus, Frankincense & Patchouli. I use the peppermint and eucalyptus every night in my diffuser. Patchouli is used in the family room and even my dogs calm down!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Haire

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very new to essential oils, I just bought a diffuser so chose any random set of oils to try out. Love these! I enjoy playing around with different combinations. Really appreciate that the box comes with a little manual on the benefits of each oil. Have yet to try them all out but I’m happy with the scent of every one I have tried so far.
customer_reviews.author: NishaR

customer_reviews.title: 1+1=2 because we love them!
customer_reviews.text: We love these oils. I originally bought them for my teenage daughter to use in her bedside diffuser, but I liked them so much I started using them as well and will be purchasing another set. These oils really help my teenage daughter with her moods and she uses them on her skin with coconut oil for different things as well. I like the recipe book that came with them. It is very helpful for trying different mixtures.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: so I got this set to see if I would really like them. For the price and this being my ...
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about this oil jazz that everyone seems to be all about, so I got this set to see if I would really like them. For the price and this being my first set I am thoroughly impressed! The aromas are strong which is good. I have used them in my diffuser and they lasted the whole time! Great product and great buy!
customer_reviews.author: bschmitz31

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: The package was left at the front door and from ten feet away I could smell it when I got home. Poor packaging caused the oils to leak producing a strong, noxious odor. This was to be a Christmas gift that I can’t give now. I’ve purchased oils in the past that were shrink-wrapped and placed in ziptop bags individually. These were set in foam with no additional packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: I'll buy again
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I really like our set. He likes to play alchemist and mix them up while I like to follow the booklet but we enjoy them all the same. It's reasonably priced so I gave 2 sets to friends and they were pleased as well. We don't put them in our food or drinks and don't advise others to either. I'll definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Well...

customer_reviews.title: Leaking bottles
customer_reviews.text: I usually like this brand, I have used many oils from this company and have been very happy with the choice. I bought this 8 pack of oils, they were all leaking and just a mess, I sent them back for a replacement, I got it and it was the same way! I kept it, just because I didn’t want to deal with the hassle of returning again and the one oil that I was out of was ok..... I would suggest ordering individual oils instead of the “box”. But as far as this brand of oils, I like them a lot and I use to sell young living oil.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Check for leaks....
customer_reviews.text: They smell amazing but I had 2 bottles that had leaked I could smell them before I got the package out of the mailbox. I sent a message to the company and I have not gotten a response. It states on the order page that if the bottles leak they will make it right. That is the only problem I have with the oils other than that they are great. I am submitting a picture and you can see where the oil had leaked onto the styrofoam.
customer_reviews.author: STACY R.

customer_reviews.title: no more doubts
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant at first because these are cheaper compared to the therapeutic grade essential oils my mum buy locally. I thought they are some knock off or diluted oils but I was wrong. The scent was as strong and lasted as long as the more expensive oils she has. She was really happy I've found these on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: These oils are amazing! I've used YoungLiving and Doterra oils before
customer_reviews.text: These oils are amazing! I've used YoungLiving and Doterra oils before, and these are definitely just as strong and just as good of quality. Oils can be so expensive but you don't want to compromise quality for price. There is no compromise here- great quality and great price. When I diffuse the oils in the morning, the smell of the oils lasts all day long (in a good way!) I received the set with three bottles that had leaked. Desert Beauty got back to me promptly and resent me the three oils, plus another with no extra charge. I'm extremely satisfied with this purchase and will definitely let others know about this set.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: I liked the price for the 8 oils but there is ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked the price for the 8 oils but there is something wrong with the Peppermint. It has a super sweet smell like mints were melted and oils added to the mixture. I have 3 other Peppermint oils and this is the only one that smells like that. I agree with other reviews that the smells seem to weaken after a little while in the diffuer.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle W

product_meta.title: ArtNaturals Therapeutic-Grade Aromatherapy Essential Oil Set – (8 x 10ml) - 100% Pure of the Highest Quality Oils – Peppermint, Tea Tree, Lavender, Eucalyptus
feature_bullets: Aroma as therapy: At ArtNaturals, we believe that aroma is the best therapy. And it smells way better, and costs way less than other forms of therapy. Our luxuriously scented, pure essential oils can help you slay your day and sleep tight all night.

Make scents of your space: When used with ArtNaturals aroma diffusers, our essential oils can transform your Om Sweet Home into a relaxing sanctuary of scented bliss. Breathe in tranquility, breathe out stress. No yoga pass required.

Get creative: We’d love to inspire you with our DIY essential oil recipes for beauty, health, and home. Or you can create your own vibe by designing your own signature scents. Mixing artnaturals essential oils together is so easy, you’ll be a scent ninja in no time.

Science stuff: ArtNaturals essential oils are 100% pure, unadulterated, therapeutic grade, and GC/MS tested. Analysis reports are available on our website if you’re into that kind of thing. But you can just let your nose be the judge.

Purity please: When it comes to essential oils, purity is everything you want and nothing you don’t. That’s why artnaturals essential oils are always pure, vegan, and cruelty-free. So you can smell good while feeling good. We take our purity promise to you seriously, but please have fun with our products.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
